009package Ransac;
010
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.List;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015//import ij.IJ;
016import ij.ImagePlus;
017import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
018import ij.gui.Overlay;
019import ij.plugin.ImagesToStack;
020import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
021import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
022import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
024import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
025import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
027import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
028import imagingbook.common.ransac.RansacDetectorCircle;
029import imagingbook.common.ransac.RansacCurveResult;
030
031/**
032 * RANSAC circle detection implemented with imagingbook library class
033 * {@link RansacDetectorCircle}.
034 * 
035 * @author WB
036 *
037 */
038public class Ransac_Circles_Detect implements PlugInFilter, Settings {
039
040        private static RansacDetectorCircle.Parameters params = new RansacDetectorCircle.Parameters();
041        private static int MaxCircleCount = 3;
042        private static int RandomSeed = 17;
043        
044        private int W, H;
045        private ImagePlus im;
046        private String title;
047
048        @Override
049        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
050                this.im = im;
051                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
052        }
053
054        @Override
055        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
056                title = "Circles from " + im.getTitle();
057                W = ip.getWidth();
058                H = ip.getHeight();     
059                
060                if (!runDialog()) {
061                        return;
062                }
063        
064                Pnt2d[] points = IjUtils.collectNonzeroPoints(ip);
065                List<RansacCurveResult<GeometricCircle>> circles = new ArrayList<>();
066
067                // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
068                RansacDetectorCircle detector = new RansacDetectorCircle(params);
069                // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
070                
071                if (RandomSeed > 0) {
072                        detector.getRandom().setSeed(RandomSeed);
073                }
074                
075                List<ImagePlus> resultImages = new ArrayList<>();
076                int cnt = 0;
077
078                RansacCurveResult<GeometricCircle> sol = detector.findNext(points);
079                while (sol != null && cnt < MaxCircleCount) {
080                        circles.add(sol);
081                        cnt = cnt + 1;
082                        
083                        ImagePlus imSnap = new ImagePlus("circle-"+cnt, showPointSet(points));
084                        Overlay oly = new Overlay();
085                        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
086                        imSnap.setOverlay(oly);
087                        
088                        {       // draw inliers (points)
089                                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(LineStrokeWidth, InlierColor, 0);
090                                stroke.setFillColor(InlierColor);
091                                for (Pnt2d p : sol.getInliers()) {
092                                        ola.addShape(p.getShape(InlierRadius), stroke);
093                                }
094                        }
095        
096                        {       // draw initial circle
097                                GeometricCircle circle = sol.getPrimitiveInit();
098                                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(LineStrokeWidth, InitialFitColor, 0);
099                                ola.addShape(circle.getShape(), stroke);
100                        }
101        
102                        {       // draw final circle
103                                GeometricCircle circle = sol.getPrimitiveFinal();
104                                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(LineStrokeWidth, FinalFitColor, 0);
105                                ola.addShape(circle.getShape(), stroke);
106                        }
107        
108                        {       // draw the 3 random points used
109                                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(LineStrokeWidth, RandomDrawDotColor, 0);
110                                stroke.setFillColor(RandomDrawDotColor);
111                                for (Pnt2d p : sol.getDraw()) {
112                                        ola.addShape(p.getShape(RandoDrawDotRadius), stroke);
113                                }
114                        }
115                        
116                        resultImages.add(imSnap);
117                        sol = detector.findNext(points);
118                }
119
120                // combine all result images to a stack:
121                if (resultImages.isEmpty()) {
122                        IJ.error("No items detected!");
123                }
124                else {
125                        ImagePlus stack = ImagesToStack.run(resultImages.toArray(new ImagePlus[0]));
126                        stack.setTitle(title);
127                        stack.show();
128                }
129                
130                List.of(1,2,3,4);
131        }
132
133        // ------------------------------------------------------
134        
135        private ByteProcessor showPointSet(Pnt2d[] points) {
136                ByteProcessor bp = new ByteProcessor(W, H);
137                IjUtils.drawPoints(bp, points, 255);
138                bp.invertLut();
139                return bp;
140        }
141        
142        private boolean runDialog() {
143                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
144                params.addToDialog(gd);
145                gd.addNumericField("Max. number of circles", MaxCircleCount);
146                gd.addNumericField("Random seed", RandomSeed);
147                
148                gd.addStringField("Output title", title, 16);
149                
150                gd.showDialog();
151                if (gd.wasCanceled())
152                        return false;
153                
154                params.getFromDialog(gd);
155                MaxCircleCount = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
156                RandomSeed = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
157                title = gd.getNextString();
158                
159                return params.validate();
160        }
161}
